Package org.tiian.lixa.xta

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    The Config class contains the configuration associated to a Transaction object (composition pattern).
    ErrorCodes
    This class contains the constants necessary to map the codes returned by the C native functions wrapped by the JNI methods.
    LixaDummyXAResource
    This XA Resource is useful only for test purposes and has no useful production usage
    LixaMonkeyXAResource
    This XA Resource is useful only for test purposes and has no useful production usage
    Transaction
    The Transaction class implements the methods necessary to manage XTA transactions, like commit and rollback.
    TransactionManager
    TransactionManager class provides the factory to create Transaction objects.
    XtaXid
    The XtaXid class implements the Xid interface provided by the JTA standard.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    XtaException
    XtaException class extends standard Java Exception class and adds a method to retrieve the native LIXA return code that's the root cause of the exception
